document.full_text: a suicide bomber wounded two bystanders in the kazakh city of aktobe when he blew himself up inside the offices of the state security services on tuesday, a spokesman for the prosecutor-general said.
document.title: suicide bomber attacks security police in kazakh city
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber wounded two bystanders in the kazakh city of aktobe when he blew himself up inside the offices of the state security services on tuesday, a spokesman for the prosecutor-general said.
